edu.usm.cos420.assignment1.view.impl

Class CustomerMenuView

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.usm.cos420.assignment1.view.impl.CustomerMenuView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MenuView

    public class CustomerMenuView
extends java.lang.Object
implements MenuView
    View class to display and receive customer menu choices

    • Method Detail

      • displayMainMenu

        public void displayMainMenu()
        Display menu options to user
        Specified by:
        displayMainMenu in interface MenuView

      • getMainMenuChoice

        public int getMainMenuChoice()
        Read the menu choice from the user

        Method will not return until a valid choice has been made

        Specified by:
        getMainMenuChoice in interface MenuView
        Returns:
        • 1 : Add a customer to the system
        • 3 : Find a customer in the system
        • 4 : List all customers in the system
        • 0 : Exit the customer menu

      • getIdInput

        public int getIdInput(boolean checkId)
        Get user input for a Customer ID
        Parameters:
        checkId - set to true to check the ID is not yet used
        Returns:
        either a valid Customer ID or #EXIT if the user wishes to abort the operation

      • getNameInput

        public java.lang.String getNameInput()
        Get user input for a Customer name. Will not return until a nonempty string is input
        Returns:
        a valid Customer name

      • getAddressInput

        public java.lang.String getAddressInput()
        Get user input for a Customer address. Will not return until a nonempty string is input
        Returns:
        a valid Customer address

      • customerNotFound

        public void customerNotFound(java.lang.String message)
        Report that a Customer could not be found in the system
        Parameters:
        message - detail for the Customer who coulnd't be located

      • displayAllCustomers

        public void displayAllCustomers(java.util.List<Customer> customers)
        Display a list Customers
        Parameters:
        customers - the list of Customers to display

      • multipleCustomersFound

        public void multipleCustomersFound(java.util.List<Customer> customers)
        Display that multiple customers were found on lookup
        Parameters:
        customers - all Customer instances that were found from search

      • abortAdd

        public void abortAdd()
        Display abort message for adding Customers

        public void abortLookup()

      • displayLookupMenu

        public void displayLookupMenu(Customer customer)
        Display options for accessing a specific customer
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer which is being accessed or changed

      • getLookupMenuChoice

        public int getLookupMenuChoice()
        Read the menu choice from the user

        Method will not return until a validate choice has been made

        Returns:
        • 5 : Access customer's orders
        • 6 : edit the customer's ID
        • 7 : edit the customer's name
        • 8 : edit the customer's address
        • 0 : Exit the customer menu

      • abortEdit

        public void abortEdit(java.lang.String message)
        Report an aborted edit of a Customer field
        Parameters:
        message - specifies the field which was being edit. Set to null for default message

      • confirmEdit

        public boolean confirmEdit(Customer customer,
                           Customer updatedCustomer)
        Prompt user to confirm the edit
        Parameters:
        customer - the original version of the Customer
        updatedCustomer - the updated version of the Customer
        Returns:
        true if the user wishes to edit, false otherwise
